Plot: 1958. Rose is a terrible secretary but a demon typist. Her handsome boss resolves to turn her into the fastest girl in the world.
Title: Populaire
Writer: Régis Roinsard (scenario), Daniel Presley (scenario), Romain Compingt (scenario)
Actors: Romain Duris, Déborah François, Bérénice Bejo, Shaun Benson
tomatoConsensus: The cheerfully frothy Populaire may lack substance, but its visual appeal -- and director Roinsard's confident evocation of 1950s filmmaking tropes -- help carry the day.
